name: Hentai Splash
description:
You can download DLC.
The game features DLC which allows you to have additional contents.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1269440/



This game is a game that aims at the target by blowing the tide.
An event will occur if you succeed three times.
There are 5 stages in total and 5 beautiful girls are waiting.

Method of operation:
Set the standard with the mouse.
・ Splash with a click.
・ Success when hitting the pink target.
・ I challenge three times.
・ It becomes more and more difficult.
